title: Vertical emphasis sans with curly lowercase i with a round dot and rounded black cut
content:
Any pointers?

cheers.

author: alastair

comments.content:
Living appears to be [Apex Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063634/http:/vllg.com/constellation/apex-sans) by Chester Jenkins.

EDIT: Late …

And Apex New for Living, I assume?

[http://vllg.com/constellation/apex-new/typer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317063634/http:/vllg.com/constellation/apex-new/typer "http://vllg.com/constellation/apex-new/typer")
Much obliged! Yep looks like a mix of the Rounded Ultra and Apex New Medium for 'Living'
